## Validate.toContextToken() function

Converts a string to a [ContextToken](./ts-res.contexttoken.md) if it is a valid context token.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toContextToken(token: string): Result<ContextToken>;
```

</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ContextToken](./ts-res.contexttoken.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ContextToken](./ts-res.contexttoken.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
